#coding guidelines.

= Coding Guidelines =

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Access Methods:
   * GET: getXXX() or XXX()
   * SET: setXXX()
   * Methods start with small first letter
   * Methods can have capital letters to seperate Words (xxX)
  * Class Members:
   * start with a underscore: _XXX
  * Var Names (if scope scope > localmethod):
   * start with a small letter
   * words sperated with capital letter xxX (no underscores)
